Text: O me̩ gogbodo̩ Jihofa, me̩ kwadʼodu-wñ,
Me̩ fʼeli ko̩ ñw u, me̩ keli dʼo̩,
Me̩ dʼodu-wñ kiafo̩ nʼoji ago;
Me̩ tene Jihofa kpai ukpahiu-wñ,
Me̩ dibekadʼuko̩lo̩ aye-wñ kʼi che le̩,
O ame̩ ugbe̩ Ebraham adu-wñ le̩,
Owñ che Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa;
Ibe-wñ kado alo-wñ kʼi kpe̩ le̩ ogbe-gbe̩le̩,
owñ chʼe-kʼi kpe̩ kpai Ebraham le̩,
oñ i fʼu Ionyane̩ ñw Jeko̩b ki mud uhio̩me̩,
kakini, Uwe̩ nadʼane̩ Kenan ñw u
E̩gba kʼaluka aboke̩le̩-ma chʼo̩ree ta,
ku ma tale ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi,
i je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du de ma mane̩ n;
kakini, Me̩ ki do̩wo̩kado abo-mi kʼu fʼekpo ba tʼuma oji le̩ n,
Tak i do̩ o̩kpo̩ta wa bʼane̩ le̩ ma,
i fʼone̩ kpe̩ tʼuma o̩gba,
Ma fʼagba demʼe̩re̩-wñ ki wʼo̩,
gbogbo wʼiko kʼo̩la-wñ wa che̩
Onu fʼone̩ kpe̩ amʼagba-wñ ta,
i mʼowñ du chʼodu unyi-wñ,
kʼi fʼamagboji-wñ ji e̩gba du kʼi rʼo̩ eju,
Tak Israe̩l lewa Ijipti;
I la je̩ ñw amone̩-wñ wewe nyo̩gba otemeje,
I fʼuma e̩do̩ rida ku ma chʼulaka amone̩-wñ,
I fu Mose̩s adu-wñ kpe̩ wa,
Ma chʼujiwe-wñ ujiwe-wñ efu ma,
I fʼe̩chubi kpe̩ wa, oñ i che ki chubi o̩mo̩;
I fʼomiofo-ma rida e̩bie̩,
Amo̩bana che̩ko̩ oj ane̩-ma,
I fʼo̩la ka oñ amachichi ke̩che̩ wa,
I dʼokuta o̩mo̩jo̩cha ñw ma koji omi ojale,
I kwokpʼikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma-ma
I fʼo̩la ka oñ imiejo lewa,
oñ ma fʼe̩wñ eñmi okoke du oj ane̩-ma lo̩ kpa,
I laño̩ fʼamo̩mo̩gba oj ane̩-ma chaka kpa rinyo̩,
Tak i ko ma manyʼajifa kpai o̩jamalia dufu wa,
Abo Ijipti ayo̩ abu ku ma kwo bʼuma te̩,
I fʼakpa nadala bʼuma oji ma,
Ma bi, oñ i kʼamagbailo wa,
I mʼokuta bi, oñ omiofo muke̩che̩ dufu;
Todu i libekado o̩la-wñ kiafo̩ le̩,
Abe̩le̩ i kʼamone̩-wñ dufu wa kpai uyo̩,
Tak i mʼane̩ ane̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ko ñw ma;
todu kʼama ki fʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ de,
